name: Plynk – Planet Match Puzzle
description:
Plynk – Planet Match Puzzle

Connect the planet icons by drawing lines between them to solve the amazing pipeline puzzle game.
It is time to turn on your space adventurer mode! Put your focus and puzzle solving skills to test with this new and exciting space puzzle game. The pipeline puzzle game is all about matching the planets shown to you on the game board and solve the entire puzzle in as few moves as possible.
Whether you are a new player or a polished professional line puzzle solver, this game will test your skills – all thanks to tons of varying difficulty levels.
Try it now!

Pipeline Connect Puzzle Fun
Are you good at solving color match puzzles? Will you like to test your color matching skills in this intense space adventure game? Step foot into the world of lost twin planets and do the best you can to reunite the planets again. You will be presented with randomly arranged planets in every stage. Your goal is to find the free path and draw lines to connect the dots of same color.

Connect The Dots and Have Fun
Connect the dots can only be achieved by drawing connect lines of the same color as the planet. You can not join two oppositely colored planets in this game. Some levels will be easy, offering you free moving action while, other levels will demand greater thinking and skills to circumvent the blocks and danger zones for connecting the planets.

Multiple Difficulty Levels
The game offers more than 6 different difficulty levels with hundreds of stages in every level. Choose from beginner, easy, not so bad, challenging, hard and very difficult to have fun!

How to play Plynk – Planet Match Puzzle
⦁ Download and launch the pipeline connect puzzle
⦁ Choose a difficulty level and pick a pipeline puzzle stage
⦁ Swipe on the screen to draw lines and connect the dots
⦁ Decide best course to connect lines with all planets
⦁ Collect color match space adventure stars
⦁ Reset, undo or move to next connect the dots level

Features of Plynk – Planet Match Puzzle
⦁ Simple and easy pipeline puzzle game UI/UX
⦁ Appealing color match puzzle layout and smooth swiping controls
⦁ Great past time game for new players as well as pro players
⦁ More than 6 different pipeline puzzle levels ranging from beginner, easy, not so bad, challenging, hard and very difficult
⦁ Swipe in any direction on the puzzle blocks to connect the dots
⦁ Color match the puzzle elements by drawing lines between the objects
⦁ 100s of space adventure levels ranging from simple levels to complex levels with pathway blocks
⦁ Option to get game hints by purchasing them from the app
⦁ Easily reset any color match level and connect lines all over again
⦁ Option to undo a wrong move and correct it within the game
⦁ No time limits in easy mode – play freely for as long as you like
⦁ Complete the pipeline puzzle meter and view your progress from game easily
⦁ Intuitive user controls and cool game sound effects for best gaming action

Will you like to get into action to complete 100s of space adventures from the comfort of your couch? The new pipeline puzzle game is the best option available. Download and play Plynk – Planet Match Puzzle today!
